responses.text: Hi there! I'm Nizar’s AI Assistant, here to share details about his AI, MERN stack projects, skills, or professional journey!
Hello! Welcome to Nizar’s portfolio. Ask me about his AI-driven solutions, MERN stack applications, or career experiences!

Nizar is proficient in MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js (MERN stack), Python, R, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Statistical Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining, Power BI, Tableau, Excel, Streamlit, and Game Theory. He excels in critical thinking and collaborative working.

Nizar’s technical skills include full-stack MERN development, programming (Python, R, Java), web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), databases (MySQL, MongoDB), and analytics tools (Power BI, Tableau, Streamlit). He’s also strong in statistical modeling and teamwork.

Nizar’s projects include Healthy Train (real-time train health dashboard), CivicFix (MERN stack civic issue tracker), Creative Spark (AI creativity platform), AI-Powered Data Insight Portal, MindAidPro (mental health chatbot), and AetheriumAnalyzer (AI script analysis tool). Check them out in the Projects section!

Nizar has built innovative projects like Healthy Train, CivicFix, Creative Spark, AI-Powered Data Insight Portal, MindAidPro, and AetheriumAnalyzer, showcasing his AI and MERN stack expertise. Want details on a specific one?

Healthy Train is a real-time dashboard monitoring railway train health using multi-sensor input streams. It achieves 87% early detection accuracy on anomalies like overheating and excess vibration, using Node.js and Plotly.js for live visualizations. View it at https://mohamednizar17.github.io/TrainHealthIndex/.

CivicFix is a full-stack MERN web application empowering citizens to report public issues like potholes and water leaks. It features user authentication, image uploads, and an admin dashboard for managing reports. View it at https://civicfix-frontend-pearl.vercel.app/.

Creative Spark is a MERN stack web application designed to unleash creativity through playful AI tools and challenges. It offers user login, registration, and feedback features for creative works. View it at https://creative-spark-alpha.vercel.app/.

AI-Powered Data Insight Portal is a web app for analyzing and visualizing CSV data with AI-driven insights, offering interactive data preparation and multiple chart types. View it at https://mohamednizar17.github.io/AI-Powered_data_insight_portal/.

MindAidPro is an AI-driven mental health chatbot using NLP models to provide personalized coping strategies and resource recommendations. Built with Streamlit, it achieved 85% user satisfaction in beta testing. View it at https://mohamednizar17.github.io/MindAidPro/.

AetheriumAnalyzer is an AI-powered web tool for script analysis, scoring scripts (0-100) and suggesting improvements for plot, characters, and dialogue. It features file upload support and a neon-themed UI. View it at https://mohamednizar17.github.io/AetheriumAnalyzer/.

Nizar interned as an AI & Computer Vision Intern at Trivy Technologies (Jun 2025 - Jul 2025), developing real-time AI systems. He also worked as a Data Analytics Intern at Plasmid Innovations (Jul 2024 - Aug 2024) and a Marketing Intern at Skill Vertex (Aug 2023 - Sep 2023).

Nizar’s professional experience includes internships at Trivy Technologies (AI & Computer Vision), Plasmid Innovations (Data Analytics), and Skill Vertex (Marketing), showcasing his versatility in AI, analytics, and strategy.

At Trivy Technologies (Jun 2025 - Jul 2025), Nizar developed real-time AI solutions for fight and violence detection, unauthorized entry detection, and facial emotion recognition, enhancing security systems with computer vision models.

As a Data Analytics Intern at Plasmid Innovations (Jul 2024 - Aug 2024), Nizar created Power BI dashboards and visual reports to support data-driven decisions, analyzing datasets for key trends and insights.
As a Marketing Intern at Skill Vertex (Aug 2023 - Sep 2023), Nizar assisted in executing marketing strategies and conducted market research to enhance campaign targeting, boosting brand engagement.
Nizar is pursuing a B.Tech in AI and Data Science at BSA Crescent Institute (2022-2026, CGPA: 9.4). He scored 93% in HSC (2022) and 98% in SSLC (2020) at St. Joseph AMHS School, Kallakurichi.
Nizar has earned multiple certifications in AI, data science, and web development. View them at https://github.com/mohamednizar17/Certificates.
Reach Nizar at arnizz077@gmail.com, +919786083250, or on GitHub at mohamednizar17.
Nizar is ideal for roles in AI, computer vision, data science, and MERN stack development, with proven expertise in real-time AI systems and full-stack web applications.

Nizar, a final-year B.Tech student (CGPA: 9.4), excels in AI, computer vision, and MERN stack development. His projects like CivicFix and internships at Trivy Technologies make him a strong candidate for innovative tech roles.
Nizar is passionate about AI, computer vision, and MERN stack development. He enjoys building solutions for real-world challenges in transportation, civic infrastructure, and mental health.
Nizar aims to innovate in AI, computer vision, and web development, creating scalable solutions for transportation, civic engagement, and mental health challenges.

Nizar works with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Python, R, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Power BI, Tableau, Excel, Streamlit, and Plotly.js for AI, data visualization, and MERN stack development.

Nizar’s AI expertise includes NLP, machine learning, computer vision, and statistical modeling. Projects like MindAidPro, AetheriumAnalyzer, and his Trivy Technologies internship showcase his real-world AI applications.
Nizar, a final-year student, is open to internships and projects in AI, computer vision, and MERN stack development. Contact him at arnizz077@gmail.com for opportunities!
